items.title: CFP National Championship 2026: Notre Dame fans predict Miami vs. Indiana
items.summary: We’re very close to getting this nightmare over with — or maybe started — I don’t know, but the National Championship Game between the Indiana Hoosiers and Miami Hurricanes is being played on Monday night. We’ve seen a number of Notre Dame fans talk about not watching or paying attention to the college football playoff […]

items.title: Throwback Thursday: Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Michigan State, 1987
items.summary: There are moments in Notre Dame football history that feel larger than the final score—games that announce something bigger is coming. The 1987 season opener against Michigan State was one of those moments. It was the first game of Notre Dame’s 100th season of football, and it came against a tough Spartan team led by […]
